<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行榜',
    '连载中',
    '已完结'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/top.html`',
    '`${host}/weekly/?page={{page}}`',
    '`${host}/complete/?page={{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, -1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
    if(String(Account).length > 0 && baseUrl.includes('/login')) {
        Login();
        let url = String(Get('url') + '/user/' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) + '/favorite/albums');
        java.setContent(java.get(url,Headers).body());
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/user/')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-6.col-sm-3.col-md-3.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.video-title.title-truncate');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/watchlist')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-3.col-sm-2.col-md-2.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.image-item-text');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    var list = java.getElements('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = $('.m-t-5.title-truncate.video-title');
        var authors = [];
        var titleTruncateElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in titleTruncateElements) {
            if (!titleTruncateElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                authors.push(String(titleTruncateElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/(&| & | \|,|\s)/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/');
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            if (kindElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        kind = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        kind = '♥ ' + list[i].select('.text-white').text() +',' + $('.category-icon').replace(/[ ]/g, ',') + ','+ kind.replace(java.s2t($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(java.t2s($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,|中$/g, ',');
        kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1');
        img = list[i].select('.img-responsive.lazy_img');
        cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + String(list[i].select('a')[0].attr('href')).replace(/(\/.*?\/\d+\/).*/, '$1') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15')).includes(String(list[0]))) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

    return style;
}

    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];

    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken"))).length == 0) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-collect/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18`, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
}
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=2`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('排行', url1, 1, 0.2, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=4`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('新作', url2, 1, 0.2, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=5`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('完结', url3, 1, 0.2, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/system/dict-data/list?dictType=vv_mh_category')).data;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&cateid=${kind[i].value}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].label, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));

    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';

url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-topestmh-<,{{page}}>`;

O = `{{Get('o')}}`;

}

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '最近更新',
    '新书发布',
    '推荐漫画'
];
orderby = [
    '/ranking/all',
    '/ranking/monthly',
    '/ranking/weekly',
    '/ranking/daily',
    '/update',
    '/update/newbook',
    '/update/recommend'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版','肉欲','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之妇','女大生','狗血剧','同居','好友','调教','动作','后宫',
    '不伦','3D','校园','耽美','日漫'
];
link = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版漫画','肉慾','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之婦','女大生','狗血劇','同居','好友','調教','动作','後宮',
    '不倫','3D','校園','耽美','日漫'
];
Ob = `{{get('ob',Get('p'))}}`;
St = `{{get('st',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics/${link[j]}/ob/${Ob}/st/${St}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '韩国',
    '连载',
    '完结',
    '日本',
    '连载',
    '完结'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画'
];
end = [
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1',
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1'
];
for (i in title) {
    url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}&area=1&end=${end[i]}`;
    url2 = '&page={{page}}';
    url = url1 +url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=全部&area=-1&end=`;
url2 = '&page={{page}}';
title = [
    '全部',
    '完结'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = url1 + i + url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, -1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/api/rank/0-0-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/latest/{{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, 0.4, false));
}
title1 = [
    '韩国','完结','连载','更新',
    '日本','完结','连载','更新'
];
url1 = [
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-2-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-1-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-2-1-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-2-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-1-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-3-1-{{page}}`'
];
for (i in title1) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title1[i], eval(url1[i]), 1, 0.2, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
type = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版漫画',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}

title = [
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架'
];
name = [

];

];
for (i in title) {

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
var Result = java.ajax(Get('url') + '/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&mobile=2');
let ck = cookie.getCookie(Get('url'));
if (ck.includes('auth=')) {
    var J= org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(Result);
    var user = J.select('.text-center')[1].text();
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), user);
} else {
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"),'');
}
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('auth=')) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('阅读记录', `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&type=lishi&page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Get('url')));
type = J.select('[data-field="category_id"]');
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Jindu = `{{get('jindu',Get('o'))}}`;
Shuxing = `{{get('shuxing',Get('p'))}}`;
Odfie = `{{get('odfie',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=ku${String('&category_id=' + type[j].attr('data-value')).replace(/&category_id=empty/, '')}${Jindu}${Shuxing}&odfie=${Odfie}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[j].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
